titleStmt.title: Die Iovis, 2 September, 1647. A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: Taking into consideration the danger of allowing evil-affected persons to resort to the doors of the Houses on pretence of arrears due to them no one is to resort to the House on this pretence. The guards are to seize all persons coming on this account, whose arrears, if any are due, are to be foreited -- Cf. Steele.
Order to print signed: Jo. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
